name: MON (Bronislaw)
description:
MON is a really short story about a guy who loves a girl a way too much.

Oh, and there is a monster.

Controls:

XSelect / Next messageUp and down arrowsChoose an option

A game by Clément "Bronislaw" Nowacki

Music credits :

Visager - The Great Forest
 Pixel Beats - Loneliness
 Tanner Lueck - Dramatic Diagnosis

Made with Construct 2 , BFXR and Aseprite
